I have DVD box set of the series.
This series was ranked 2nd of the most po=
pular Taiga drama.
http://ranking.goo.ne.jp/ranking.php?C1=3D022&C2=3Dnhk_t=
aigadrama

The script writer Mitani Kouki is comedy writer, so the drama is=
 
pretty funny.
The historical accuracy is 85%(my estimate)
He added some f=
ictional episodes like 
-Kondou and Hijikata and Sakamoto Ryouma and Katsur=
a Kogoro were 
friends 
-Saitou Hajime saved by Kondou in Edo
-Kondou's wif=
e to confront Kondou's mistress
etc

Episode of Yamanami's seppuku was real=
ly really sad.
NHK received hundreds of "save Yamanami petitions" from view=
ers.
Viewers also requested NHK to make following episode for Hijikata 
whi=
ch was aired in January 3rd.

Shinsengumi!! The last day of Hijikata Toshiz=
ou
